movements.name: Wrist rocks
movements.description: Shift weight forward and back over the hands to build wrist strength and tolerance.

movements.name: Leaning wrist rocks
movements.description: Increased angle wrist rocks to build more load tolerance before inversion.

movements.name: Wrist weight-shifts
movements.description: Shift weight side to side to build balance corrections through the wrist.

movements.name: Wrist conditioning
movements.description: General wrist prep routine to prepare for loading.

movements.name: Palm lifts
movements.description: Lift palms while keeping fingers on ground to train finger flexors.

movements.name: Desk palm lifts
movements.description: Office-friendly palm lift variation done on the desk edge.

movements.name: Fingertip holds
movements.description: Support weight through fingertips to develop handstand balance corrections.

movements.name: Desk fingertip holds
movements.description: Office-friendly fingertip holds done leaning on a desk edge.

movements.name: Forearm finger stretch (on desk)
movements.description: Gentle forearm and finger stretch using a desk edge.

movements.name: Scap push-ups
movements.description: Straight-arm protraction/retraction for shoulder stability.

movements.name: Standing scap push-ups (against wall)
movements.description: Wall variation of scap push-ups for lighter loading in office settings.

movements.name: Scap elevation/depression
movements.description: Shrug up and down while keeping arms straight to build overhead stability.

movements.name: Serratus punches
movements.description: Train serratus with forward pressing motions.

movements.name: Wall serratus reach
movements.description: Serratus activation while leaning on the wall.

movements.name: Box pike hold
movements.description: Inverted position loading shoulders with hips stacked over hands.

movements.name: Box pike holds
movements.description: Multiple sets of inverted position with hips stacked over hands.

movements.name: Box pike shoulder taps
movements.description: Alternating shoulder taps while inverted on a box.

movements.name: Wall plank
movements.description: Feet on wall, hands on floor, training early inversion control.

movements.name: Wall walk to halfway
movements.description: Walk feet up the wall until halfway inverted.

movements.name: Wall walks
movements.description: Walk feet up the wall to build inversion comfort.

movements.name: Wall walks to ¾ height
movements.description: More advanced wall walk with greater shoulder loading.

movements.name: Wall walks (¾ height → full height)
movements.description: Full wall walks progressing from partial to complete inversion.

movements.name: Wall walks with step-outs
movements.description: Wall walks combined with lateral stepping to practice walking mechanics.

movements.name: Chest-to-wall hold
movements.description: True handstand line drill facing the wall.

movements.name: Chest-to-wall holds
movements.description: Multiple sets of chest-to-wall holds for time under tension.

movements.name: Toe pulls
movements.description: Pull toes away from wall to find balance.

movements.name: Toe pulls from wall
movements.description: Pull toes away from wall to find the balance point.

movements.name: Heel pulls
movements.description: Lean back to tap heels lightly on wall.

movements.name: Heel pulls from wall
movements.description: Lean heels back towards wall to control overbalance.

movements.name: Toe pulls & heel pulls
movements.description: Combined toe and heel pulls to practice balance corrections.

movements.name: Kick-up practice
movements.description: Practice safe and consistent entry into handstand.

movements.name: Kick-up practice (controlled entry to wall)
movements.description: Controlled kick-up entries finishing at the wall.

movements.name: Kick-up to wall (kiss and come away)
movements.description: Kick up to lightly touch wall and return to balance.

movements.name: Wall kiss and come away
movements.description: Lightly tap wall and return to balance.

movements.name: Controlled attempts
movements.description: Freestanding balance attempts with focus on form.

movements.name: Freestanding attempts
movements.description: Practice holding a handstand away from the wall.

movements.name: Handstand step-outs
movements.description: Take small controlled steps in handstand.

movements.name: Step-outs
movements.description: Practice lateral steps while inverted.

movements.name: Short-distance handstand walks
movements.description: Walk 1–3 metres maintaining form.

movements.name: Small distance free walks (1-2m)
movements.description: Short freestanding walks to build confidence.

movements.name: Line walking
movements.description: Walk along a marked path or chalk line.

movements.name: Line walking between floor markers (optional)
movements.description: Walk in a straight line between floor markers for precision.

movements.name: Walking drills
movements.description: Various drills to improve handstand walking technique.

movements.name: Control drills
movements.description: Drills focused on improving balance control in handstand.

movements.name: Desk lean hold (standing incline plank)
movements.description: Straight-arm bodyweight lean to simulate overhead pressing pattern.

movements.name: Tuck plank on box
movements.description: Core compression drill with shoulders loaded over hands.

movements.name: Standing ribs down hold
movements.description: Teach hollow-body mechanics while standing with arms overhead.

movements.name: Standing oblique brace
movements.description: Train lateral stability and bracing.

movements.name: Standing knee lifts
movements.description: Train active hip flexion and balance.

movements.name: Hollow body hold
movements.description: Foundation shape for all handstand balance.

movements.name: Dead bug
movements.description: Anti-extension core drill reinforcing hollow mechanics.

movements.name: Arm circles
movements.description: Shoulder warm-up and mobility drill.

movements.name: Chest openers
movements.description: Stretch to open the chest and improve shoulder position.

movements.name: Shoulder CARs
movements.description: Controlled articular rotations for shoulder health.

movements.name: Band shoulder work
movements.description: Light resistance band work for shoulder health.

movements.name: Band overhead pull-aparts
movements.description: Posterior shoulder strengthening with overhead arm position.

movements.name: Band pull-aparts
movements.description: Posterior shoulder strengthening drill.

movements.name: Band dislocates
movements.description: Shoulder mobility drill improving overhead position.

movements.name: Wall slides (Y overhead motions)
movements.description: Overhead mobility drill with back against wall.

movements.name: Pike push-up
movements.description: Bodyweight vertical pressing drill to build handstand pushing strength.

movements.name: Feet-elevated pike push-up
movements.description: Higher loading version that mimics handstand strength.

movements.name: Dumbbell strict press
movements.description: Builds overhead pressing strength directly transferable to handstand.

movements.name: Dumbbell z-press
movements.description: Seated overhead press that forces core engagement.

movements.name: Wall-facing HSPU negatives
movements.description: Eccentric handstand push-up practice for advanced shoulder strength.

movements.name: Strict press-ups
movements.description: Full-range strict press-ups from floor with a tight body line.

movements.name: Incline press-ups
movements.description: Press-ups with hands elevated to reduce difficulty.

movements.name: Bench dips
movements.description: Tricep dips using a bench or chair for support.

movements.name: Band-assisted dips
movements.description: Dips with band assistance to build towards bodyweight dips.

movements.name: Strict dips
movements.description: Full-range bodyweight dips with controlled tempo.

movements.name: Strict pull-ups
movements.description: Bodyweight pull-ups with no kipping or momentum.
